entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Island Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -26.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Lake Airport 12:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -26.8°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -30.3°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
